CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Streetwear?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Streetwear is arc {High Fashion}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Streetwear?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Streetwear is arc {Athleisure}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {High Fashion} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from High Fashion to Athleisure in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Streetwear to High Fashion in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Sustainable Fashion to Streetwear in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Fast Fashion and Streetwear in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Fast Fashion and Streetwear is {428}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Streetwear in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Streetwear is {86}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Fast Fashion?
SC.A: The total flow output from Fast Fashion is {264}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Athleisure?
SC.A: The total flow input by Athleisure is {225}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 369? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {488} from {Streetwear} to {High Fashion}, a flow of {427} from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Streetwear}, a flow of {428} from {Streetwear} to {Fast Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 104? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {70} from {Fast Fashion} to {Athleisure}, a flow of {58} from {Athleisure} to {Fast Fashion}, a flow of {86} from {Streetwear} to {Sustainable Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 139 and 174? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {155} from {High Fashion} to {Athleisure}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Athleisure to Fast Fashion or from High Fashion to Athleisure?
NC.A: The flow from {High Fashion} to {Athleisure} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Fast Fashion to Streetwear, from Streetwear to Sustainable Fashion, or from Fast Fashion to Athleisure?
NC.A: The flow from {Fast Fashion} to {Streetwear} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Sustainable Fashion}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Fast Fashion} and {Streetwear}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Streetwear, Arc Fast Fashion, Arc High Fashion, Arc Athleisure, Arc Sustainable Fashion}.
